name: For Symphony: With All One's Heart Portable
storyline: Playing as a high school student, you experience your senior year of high school with your fellow students. This includes a trip to the beach during the summer and lots of conversation on the whole.
summary: A port of For Symphony: With All One's Heart for the PlayStation Portable. The port adds a music player mode, galleries displaying sprites, CGs, 4-komas and production images.
